name: BeingBird
description:
Do you love birds? Don't you? if yes, this game is for you. You can play with your birds and collect money then buy some new birds and enjoy to play with as well. Hope you have fun with this game. Ow! i forgot to tell you when you want to buy a new bird you can read about the bird and get more about them, because i am making them from the real life. Again enjoy the game.

Friendly Note/ Play on 1600 * 900 screen size.

"JOSEPH"

Here is the trailer.
